channel.title: The Block Game - A Visual Basic 6 Puzzle Game (V2 Added.)

item.title: The Block Game - A Visual Basic 6 Puzzle Game (V2 Added.)
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Honestly, the tears thing was supposed to be a joke. But I guess I forgot this was MITB.

Like I believe I said, I didn’t care about how the level editor turned out. Infact, I was too lazy to add error handling with any of the project. Basically because it was mainly for private use, but I decided to include it.

But I guess thanks for trying to help…

Read full topic
item.source: The Block Game - A Visual Basic 6 Puzzle Game (V2 Added.)

item.title: The Block Game - A Visual Basic 6 Puzzle Game (V2 Added.)
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

“holds back tears…”
We’re an open source community, if you can’t accept that I don’t understand why you would post in the first place imo.

I mentioned the error because I thought it would help you, I don’t care if it took you four hours, or two minutes. I was giving you constructive criticism.

Read full topic

item.description:
@bundy wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:9, topic:271243”]For those requesting the source, I posted the code.

Also, version 2 added.

Neub: That’s a bug I fixed in V2… If you did what I think you did… (Started and walked left/up.)[/quote]

^^ There you are io9.
